name: vtk-armor-reach
title: VortiK's Armor Reach
author: VortiK
description: Makes the armor increase player reach for interaction, build, drop and mine range. Also increase player handcrafting and mining speed and add health bonus. Higher range for higher armor tech. Supports mods : Tiny Armors MK1 & MK2, Power Armor MK3 & MK4, Bob's Warfare Armors, Heavy MK2 & MK3 and Power Armors MK3 & MK4 & MK5. Space Exploration Thruster Suits 1 to 4. Krastorio 2's MK3 & MK4 armors. Shall Suits.
